    Main control panel for admin users.
    AdminEventLogAdapter
    Adapter for binding EventLogItem objects to RecyclerView rows.
    AdminEventLogsActivity
    Displays event logs in a scrollable list with sorting capability.
    AdminEventLogsActivity.EventLogItem
    Simple data class for holding event log information.
    AdministratorUnitTest
    Unit tests for Administrator functionality.
    AdminManagerActivity
    Activity to display and manage the list of admin users.
    AppConfig
    Central configuration class for global app settings.
    AttendeeManagerActivity
    Main activity for attendee and waitlist management.
    EditProfileSheet
    BottomSheetDialogFragment to edit user profile fields.
    EntrantManagerActivity
    Manages and displays entrant users retrieved from Firestore.
    EntrantUnitTest
    Unit tests for Entrant functionality.
    Event
    Event model with Firestore-backed waitlist/registration operations.
    EventDetailActivity
    Detail screen for a single event.
    EventDetailsAdminActivity
    Activity for administrative actions on a specific event.
    EventDetailsOrganizerActivity
    Activity for organizers to view and manage a single event.
    EventEditActivity
    Activity for organizers to create or edit events stored in Firestore.
    EventManagerActivity
    Activity for administrators to manage and inspect events.
    EventManagerAdapter
    Adapter class that binds Event objects into a scrollable list for management.
    EventManagerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Callback interface for event item click handling.
    ImageManagerActivity
    Displays an editable image grid and attaches top bar profile actions.
    ImageManagerAdapter
    Adapter that shows image previews and supports per-item deletion.
    ImageManagerAdapter.ImageItem
    Data class representing an image item with its associated event.
    ImageManagerAdapter.OnImageDeleteListener
    Callback interface for handling image deletion events.
    LoginActivity
    Activity that shows sign-in and registration flows, sets the app login role, and navigates to the appropriate screen.
    LoginActivityInstrumentedTest
    Basic instrumented tests for LoginActivity.
    LoginActivityUnitTest
    Basic unit tests for LoginActivity, this will just verify that our code works as intended and does not have any undefined behaviour inside variables and what have you.
    MainActivity
    Hosts the event list and "My Events" screens and routes to event detail/edit screens.
    MyEventsActivity
    Displays all events created by an organizer.
    NotificationAdapter
    Adapter for binding NotificationItem objects to RecyclerView rows.
    NotificationLogsActivity
    Displays notification logs in a scrollable list with sorting capability.
    NotificationLogsActivity.NotificationItem
    Data class for holding notification information.
    OrganizerEventUnitTest
    Unit tests for Event model and organizer-related logic, this will just verify that our code works as intended and does not have any undefined behaviour inside variables and what have you.
    OrganizerManagerActivity
    Manages and displays organizer users retrieved from Firestore.
    OrganizerProfileActivity
    Displays basic organizer details and provides a delete option.
    ProfileSheet
    Material bottom sheet that shows a user's profile and available actions.
    ProfileSheet.OnProfileInteractionListener
    Listener interface to notify host activities or fragments about profile-related actions initiated from the sheet.
    TopBarWiring
    Utility class for attaching top-bar interactions.
    UserManagerAdapter
    Adapter for rendering a list of users in a RecyclerView.
    UserManagerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Callback for row tap events.
